article_title: Trooper ends up having to fight for his life after traffic stop
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Mostly cloudy...isolated thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Paul Tennant ptennant@eagletribune.com

og.description: LAWRENCE — Trooper Douglas Dolan is lucky to be alive.
